alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Gates of the Mountains; Madison River Valley; Missouri Headwaters; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 13 at 2:06PM MDT until April 14 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulation up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, and southwest Montana. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Ponding of water and slushy snow accumulation will increase the occurrence of hydroplaning on area roadways and any wet surfaces will refreeze this evening and tonight. Travel could be difficult with visibility one half mile or less at times. Isolated power outages are also possible due to the heavy wet snow.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
